ModMetaData.name: RimWorld Translation Framwork
ModMetaData.author: duduluu
ModMetaData.description: NOTE: Requires HugsLib mod. RimTrans.Framwork is a modding library for translator. Supports: - Translating pawn names, included shuffled names and creative rewards names. - Adding custom pawn names and backstories. GitHub: https://github.com/duduluu/RimWorld-Translation-Framework Example: https://github.com/duduluu/RimWorld-PawnName-Chinese
